summary: This document is a Yahoo! account management record for an email account 'jeeproject@yahoo.com' associated with Jeffrey Epstein. It shows account creation details, contact information, and links to an alternate email address and business address.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The Yahoo! account 'jeeproject@yahoo.com' is registered under his name with associated business address and phone numbers.

events.title: Yahoo! account creation
events.description: The Yahoo! account 'jeeproject@yahoo.com' was created under Jeffrey Epstein's name.

locations: 457 Madison Ave. 4th Floor, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein used the Yahoo! email account 'jeeproject@yahoo.com'.
The account was created on April 2, 2001.
The account was linked to an alternate email address 'jeevacation@gmail.com'.
Epstein's business address listed was 457 Madison Ave. 4th Floor, New York, NY 10022.
The account registration IP address was 64.132.93.8.
